page.title: 12MICHELMERSH JUBILEE HALL
page.content: The{Michelmersh Jubilee Hall,} built in celebration of Queen Elizabeth's 25 year reign, acts as a centre for many events and activities important to the lives of the parishioners. It was opened in 1982 and is the venue for organisations such as: the Parish Council, the Michelmersh W.I., the Mothers' Union, the Horticultural Society, the Ratepayers' Association, a Camera Club, Keep Fit, Children and Toddlers' Playgroups and Youth Club events. As well as these it is used for private functions, pantomimes and other theatre shows, films and discos.
